add-items-copy: Are you sure you want to add these items? This cannot be undone.
archive-items-copy: Are you sure you want to archive these items? This cannot be undone.
broken_meta: The title, link, or image is broken
delete-item-copy: Are you sure you want to delete this item? This cannot be undone.
delete-tag-copy: Deleting the tag <1>{{tagToDelete}}</1> will remove it from all items. Are you sure you want to proceed?
edit-tag-copy: Editing the tag <1>{{tagToEdit}}</1> will change it on all items. Are you sure you want to proceed?
favorite-copy: Are you sure you want to favorite these items? This cannot be undone.
un-favorite-copy: Are you sure you want to un-favorite these items? This cannot be undone.
